website_summaries.verdict: Choose this all-day eyeliner if you need to make ultra-fine lines. Ideal for precision work.
pros: Just like the brand's top-selling Stay All Day Liquid Eyeliner but with a super-fine tip
Perfect for drawing lines very close to the lashes or for creating ultra-fine wings
Waterproof, all-day wear and deeply pigmented colors
cons: Tends to dry out fairly quickly
If you like bolder lines, it probably won't work for you

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Did some research after having given up wearing eyeliner after years of frustration with flaking and smudging. I love eyeliner again! The super fine tip makes it so easy to do super detailed and thin lines, but you don’t have to work hard to get it thick. I’ve been using it semi-regularly for 3 months and it’s still going, but I’m ordering more to be safe!
customer_reviews.author: LizQuincy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and lasts all day
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner us so easy to apply in thin line, or thick. I love that it stays on all day even after sweating from working outside in 94 degree temperatures. Removes easily with make up remover. I was addicted to Mac liguidlast eyeliner until I tried this. Costs a few dollars less than Mac. I will never go back. Great product, glides right on and dries fast. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Title of Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product six months ago and wanted a replacement--the title, picture and color matched what I used previously but unfortunately, the important detail of "micro tip" is buried in the description. I thought I could just make due and draw a thicker line but am using so much more product since the tip is TINY, I'm almost out and my lines aren't straight. Ha. Be careful before you purchase. The regular tip seems to go on smoother and has less user error.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie11

customer_reviews.title: Better than Blinc, for reals
customer_reviews.text: I love Blinc’s liquid eyeliner but got sick of having my credit card hacked EVERY time I ordered it from their website. Never thought I’d find a substitute I liked half as well, but I did. This eyeliner is all I’ll use from now on — both the original or regular or whatever they call it, and the micro tip. And it’s less expensive than Blinc, so bonus there.
customer_reviews.author: CLH409

customer_reviews.title: No allergy
customer_reviews.text: I’m allergic to most eye makeup these days, but I can wear this Stilla Stay All Day Waterproof Eyeliner without any adverse affects.
customer_reviews.author: LoneStarBeliever

customer_reviews.title: The Best Eyeliner Pen
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several other eye liner pens, and this one is the best of the best. Especially with the micro tip, it is easy to apply and lasts all day. It also comes off easily with makeup remover at the end of the day. Is not drying in any way. Would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for an easy to use eyeliner!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi P

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner ever!!  LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner doesn't come off all day! THIS IS THE BEST ALL DAY, NON SMUDGING, WATERPROOF EYELINER EVER!!!!!!!!!! I sweat more than normal people and any other "waterproof" eyeliner always smears, comes off and ended up on my upper lid looking like I drew a line on my upper lid. NOT THIS EYELINER!!! Please do not ever stop making this eyeliner!
customer_reviews.author: Cherbear

customer_reviews.title: It last all day!
customer_reviews.text: This is my main eyeliner on the sole purpose that it doesn't smudge. However, it does run out fairly quickly and wished that it would last longer than a month. One other thing that I don’t like about this eyeliner is that it starts off pointy enough to do a sharp wing look, but after a week of everyday use, it flattens down and the wings end up thicker without a sharp point.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Woods

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to expectations and reviews!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an alternative to some MAC eyeliner that I had that I had finished. I got both the original (thicker) one in a dark gray and black and the thinner liner in black. I have used the thicker ones and love both. When I am going around casually during the day, I like the gray. I have lighter coloring and like the natural look. The black matches my eyelashes and is better for photos and evening. The product works great and is easy to apply; just as the reviews online have indicated. Very similar to the MAC eyeliner, which was also great.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy E. Bunting-Early

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only eyeliner I use. Doing my top eyelid is so easy with this pen. Seriously one swoop, fill it in and bam! It's done. Seriously, this is also great at staying put. I can get in my feels, shed some tears, but you know what, my eyeliner stays, and I continue doing whatever it was prior to getting a little cry out. Gonna watch a sad movie? Wear this eyeliner. Gonna cut a few pounds of onions? Wear this eyeliner. Gonna stub your toe on the corner of your bed and call out to baby Jesus? Wear this eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Vittitoe

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner! It is my new favorite because it truly stays in place. It is easy to apply and goes on smoothly and then it lasts ALL DAY!
customer_reviews.author: Mama of a Princess

customer_reviews.title: First eyeliner to stay put for me!
customer_reviews.text: I've always struggled with eyeliner. My makeup migrates around my face. I have oily to normal skin and for the first time ever my eyeliner stays put!!! It comes off easy with oil or I use heimish all clean balm and haven't had an issue. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Gladwin

customer_reviews.title: Good eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to replace my current liquid liner so I grabbed this one based on Influenster reviews. It’s a pretty good liner but it is harder to put on than my last one. I like the pencil thin tip. Not sure I will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: GetThinWithJenn

customer_reviews.title: Never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this eye liner and the standard tip for years now and they never disappoint. The tip stays in its original form and doesn't smudge. It easily comes off with some miceller cleansing water.
customer_reviews.author: quratolain a.

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: I use these in every color. People often comment on my make up and want to know where i get it and what i use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My First Amazon Review
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with this purchase! My experience is exactly what the last person said "I received and began using this eyeliner less than eleven days ago. Six days into use, it stopped gliding on as smoothly, and the color that it actually did distribute was lighter and appeared faded upon application." " It does not build up (as it should), and flakes easily (as it should not). These issues are not normal! This eyeliner should NOT be exhibiting characteristics of running out after only eleven days of daily use!" I always use Stila Eyeliner and this is not the same product I am used to.
customer_reviews.author: R.B.

customer_reviews.title: I'm 68 years old and was a little hesitant to try a liquid
customer_reviews.text: I had never used a liquid eyeliner before this one. I'm 68 years old and was a little hesitant to try a liquid. I love it. It is so easy to apply. I can get a thin line so I don't look overly made up. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: D'Angelee

customer_reviews.title: Good eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: The best eyeliner I've ever encountered it glides on really well really accurate if you're wanting to make either a dramatic wing or a small natural looking wing.This eyeliner is very pigmented.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended with the thin applicator tip. Comes off really dark and pigmented and doesn’t smudge throughout the day. One con is I wish it was matte.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Fine point for easy applying
customer_reviews.text: I like the fine point for my wings and the longevity to stay on my eyeseasy to apply and doesn't smudge
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Easy to control and great pigment. The only eyeliner I use for long lasting "stayability" and deep rich black pigment.
customer_reviews.author: Mho94

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money....
customer_reviews.text: The brown stila eyeliner does NOT stay all day... it starts fading by hour 3... what a waste of money. The Nyx eyeliner works better than this
customer_reviews.author: Dechen

customer_reviews.title: Best. Eyeliner. EVER
customer_reviews.text: I was so sad when sephora stopped carrying this in store but luckily found it here. This is hands down the best liquid eyeliner (I've tried so many others and none compare). Its long lasting, easy to apply and can create a multitude of looks.
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to its name
customer_reviews.text: It really does stay on all day, and is the only liquid eyeliner I've tried that can do that. I like the Micro Tip because my eyelids are small and I just want to make a subtle thicker lash line. However the MicroTip is a little harder to draw a straight line than the original eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth N. Pham

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: one of the best waterproof eyeliners. Pricey but you are paying for quality and longevity
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Hallameyer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, uninterrupted, defined, line and is non irritating
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife. Here is her feedback: Glides on with a smooth, uninterrupted, defined, line and is non irritating. Also have the ability to make thick/thin lines by tilting the tip. Lasts all day and is true to color. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: P. Addison

customer_reviews.title: Dries out super fast
customer_reviews.text: Dried out on the second time I used It. Kept it sealed the whole time. I also purchased the regular tip before this one Andrew it did the same thing. So much money for something that’s bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gaia

customer_reviews.title: I love this Eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it was for me to learn how to use the brush to make fine lines. The liquid come out at a steady pace,and didn't just glob all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: tenzreviews

customer_reviews.title: Tip too short
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize how short the tip was. It’s way too short to use the way I would like. I should’ve purchased the regular tipped eyeliner. Their Stila liner with the regular length tip is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eyeliner is Not Waterproof or Smudgeproof. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.text: I believed the Eyeliner add referring to Waterproof and smudge proof all day liner. Not true at all. The 5 Dollar Eye liner stays on better than this does. Very misleading Seller. Not happy at all that it was so expensive. I paid for how the Seller described it would perform and Stay on my eyes. Never again..
customer_reviews.author: Gina Kline

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting liner
customer_reviews.text: The best eyeliner. I order it over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Arria

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! It does not come off during swim practice or during a regular day. I can get a super thin line and put it precisely where I want on my lid. It is a must-have for a casual everyday eyeliner look that will stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Keeps all day and looks good even by the end of the day
customer_reviews.author: Mati

customer_reviews.title: Great all day mascara!
customer_reviews.text: Great all day mascara! Highly recommend, it’s just as good as several name brands I have purchased from Sephora at double the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best liquid eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: The best product. Whoever complains about this product I would assume hasn’t tried the competition. I’ve been using it for 15 years- I’ve tried others only to be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner on market
customer_reviews.text: Best eyeliner on market, great for lining under your eyes too!
customer_reviews.author: Ju

customer_reviews.title: It’s good
customer_reviews.text: I read a review from a drag queen saying it’s the best and not gun a lie it’s been pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: the best i’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.text: BY FAR THE BEST EYELINER I’VE EVER HAD!!! it’s very easy to apply because it comes as a pen. this is the only eyeliner i’ve used so far that actually stay sharp after an entire day, although it still smudges a bit to my lower eyelids. still, it’s the best!
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Super FINE tip
customer_reviews.text: I thought I wanted a fine tip until I got this eye liner. Its the Stila we know and love but the tip is so so fine I don't think I will purchase this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite! Precise fine line doesn't smudge or wear off.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Great liquid eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Repeat buy for this eyeliner. Does the job unless u rub your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: 👌perfect eyeliner smooth, gentle, lasts
customer_reviews.text: My go to eyeliner & it lasts a long time (shelf wise and on your face too)
customer_reviews.author: cierra

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I usually use urban decay perversion waterproof fibe pt eye pen or smashbox always on liquid eyeliner but I trusted the reviews and gave it a try. Unless you cake it on like a stripper this one is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Williston

customer_reviews.title: My New Go-To!
customer_reviews.text: I feel like a professional MUA using this pen - it gives me so much accuracy over my strokes! My eyeliner has never looked so neat and crisp. I’m totally hooked - this is for sure my new go-to eyeliner 🙌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Tabish

customer_reviews.title: Overall great.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to apply and great for tight small lines. However it will not stick to my waterline.
customer_reviews.author: Tylor

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is long lasting, doesn't easily smudge and it pretty water resistance. I've tried a lot of different brands and this is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Smudges and doesn’t stay on, I’m not sure if I got sent the same product. I wouldn’t spend money on this product again and wouldn’t recommend buying it online.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Favorite eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner. I never have a problem with it smearing. I wear it swimming and I don’t notice it still on when I get out but I also don’t have a problem with it running.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Greatest eyeliner tip. Goes on so thin, just the way I want it too. Dries quickly and no smudging.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Seemayer-Iannotti

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this b4 and love. It. Has all day staying power
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie Blaskie

customer_reviews.title: My go too. Last for months
customer_reviews.text: It’s the only one I use. I’ve tried the rest
customer_reviews.author: fcher123

customer_reviews.title: It dried out in 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: It dried out In 3 weeks don't buy this eyeloner
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner! Glides on nicely and stays until I remove it with eye makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Micro tip is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love stila and the micro tip makes application so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Eye opening!
customer_reviews.text: Love the thin tip. You can achieve a very subtle natural look or go over it twice for a more defined look
customer_reviews.author: Andrea R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love Stila! Their products are amazing and it was very convenient to get on Amazon vs going to Ulta. The quality of Stila products is always top notch!
customer_reviews.author: heather daniel

customer_reviews.title: Ride or die
customer_reviews.text: Super great eyeliner ! The only one that I turn to! Can’t get enough of this eyeliner will last me months, and I use it everyday .
customer_reviews.author: Johnsana

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to apply, stays put through the work day.
customer_reviews.author: Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Tip is amazingly precise!
customer_reviews.text: This was everything I hoped it would be! Love Stila and this micro tip is nothing short of amazing!
customer_reviews.author: WifeofPA

customer_reviews.title: Hard to make a flawless line
customer_reviews.text: It delivers a beautiful fine line, but if you want a quick cat eye, choose the standard tip
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Joy

customer_reviews.title: Last all day
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this eyeliner slides on and stays on without having to refresh again during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Terri A. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this as eyeliner. Great coverage and it stays on. Easily removed. I wish the tubes lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: jan torland

customer_reviews.title: My Go To!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used so many brands, and this is now my go to liquid eyeliner. I always come back to this one. It’s never failed me.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner!! So easy to use as I like to just have a little line and tend to over fill with other eyeliners and end up with a way bigger line than wanted. Almost impossible to do with this because of the micro tip. Also stays on all day! Def recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Ran dry in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a recommended product. The pen ran dry after less than a month.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gantz

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love the micro tip. And its long lasting its my favorit i would always get the regular tip but the micro tip is my new favorite will continue to buy this product definetly worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inlove
customer_reviews.text: If you aren’t so good at it the micro tip is the answer
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Court

customer_reviews.title: The easy way to use it. So easy
customer_reviews.text: Love all the makeup products I have received and use them alot. Thanks loads for the fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer. Marian thompson

customer_reviews.title: Dried out and unable to use
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this eyeliner many times before and love it but this was my first time ordering it on amazon. When it arrived I used it maybe twice before the ink was completely dried out. I ordered two pens and both of them were this way. I’d like my $50 back.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: FRAUDULENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Within the first few uses, it was already drying out. Have been using stila for several years and this is the first time its ever dried out immediately.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Only eyeliner that doesn’t smear on me.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Goes on smoothly and stays all day.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: Stays on all day, smudge free, will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca O'Dell

customer_reviews.title: Very thin lines, long lasting eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Very thin liner. Perfect for use. Best eyeliner! Long lasting. Perfect color/ not faded.
customer_reviews.author: Jason T.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money- lasts all day I smudge
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner it lasts all day and worth the money and I’m not one to spend a lot of money on makeup
customer_reviews.author: Kpotter

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Ran the instant my eyes started watering and rubbed almost completely off within a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It stays on all day and at the end of the day washes off easily. Really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bgoller

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is so easy to use. I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Sharp

customer_reviews.title: it lasts allllll day
customer_reviews.text: i love the definition of the pen and how long lasting the liner is<3 fav of all time
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Galusha

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: The best I’ve ever used. Does exactly what it promises.
customer_reviews.author: Ragdoll

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of Stila short tip
customer_reviews.text: Liquid did not flow through - hard to draw line with short tip
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sage

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cap didn't stay on in my purse. It dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and stays put all day
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite. This is the ONLY liner that stays put all day.
customer_reviews.author: cjen

customer_reviews.title: This eyeliner was expensive (to me) what a waste.
customer_reviews.text: I received the product. I guess it was dried up. Followed the instructions. Little to no liquid eyeliner. This eyeliner was expensive (to me) what a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Fisher

product_meta.title: stila Stay All Day Waterproof Liquid Eye Liner
product_meta.description:
Color:Micro Tip Intense BlackThe fine marker-like tip offers precise application for everyone from novices to pros and results in beautifully defined eyes that will leave a lasting impression. The formula glides on with ease, dries quickly and won't smudge, day-into-night.

BRAND STORY
At the heart of Stila, we believe that the right makeup can turn even the simplest look into a statement as authentic as your signature.
